form.label: Container Logs Command Center
form.description: Real-time Container Log Analysis â€¢ Error Detection â€¢ Log Stream Monitoring

search.query: index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" earliest=-24h | stats count by host | sort -count

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" earliest=-24h | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | lookup container_lookup.csv container_short_id OUTPUT container_name | eval container_name=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval container_name=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | stats count by container_short_id, container_name | sort -count

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | where container_short_id="$container_filter$" OR "$container_filter$"="*" | stats count | fillnull value=0

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | where container_short_id="$container_filter$" OR "$container_filter$"="*" | search (ERROR OR error OR Exception OR FATAL OR stream="stderr") | stats count | fillnull value=0

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | where container_short_id="$container_filter$" OR "$container_filter$"="*" | search (WARN OR warn OR Warning) | stats count | fillnull value=0

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | stats dc(container_short_id) as unique_containers | fillnull value=0

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | where container_short_id="$container_filter$" OR "$container_filter$"="*" | stats count as total_logs | eval lps=if(total_logs>0, round(total_logs/300, 2), 0) | fillnull value=0

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | where container_short_id="$container_filter$" OR "$container_filter$"="*" | timechart span=1m count

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | where container_short_id="$container_filter$" OR "$container_filter$"="*" | eval log_level=case( match(_raw, "(?i)(ERROR|error|Exception|FATAL|fatal)") OR stream="stderr", "Error", match(_raw, "(?i)(WARN|warn|Warning)"), "Warning", 1=1, "Other" ) | search log_level!="Other" | timechart span=1m count by log_level

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ stream=$stream_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "\/var\/lib\/docker\/containers\/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | lookup container_lookup.csv container_short_id OUTPUT container_name | eval container_name=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval container_display=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval container_display=if(len(container_display)>40, substr(container_display,1,37)."...", container_display) | stats count as log_events by container_display | sort -log_events | head 15

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "/var/lib/docker/containers/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | spath input=_raw path=stream output=stream_type | spath input=_raw path=log output=log_msg | search stream_type=* | lookup container_lookup.csv container_short_id OUTPUT container_name | eval container_name=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval container_display=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | where match(log_msg, "(?i)(ERROR|Exception|FATAL)") OR stream_type="stderr" | stats count as error_count by container_display, host | sort -error_count | head 15 | eval severity=case( error_count>=100, " Critical", error_count>=50, " High", error_count>=10, "ðŸŸ¡ Medium", 1=1, " Low" ) | table severity, container_display, host, error_count | rename severity as "Severity", container_display as "Container", host as "Host", error_count as "Error Count"

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | spath input=_raw path=stream output=stream_type | search stream_type=* | eval stream_display=case(stream_type="stdout", "stdout (Normal)", stream_type="stderr", "stderr (Errors)", 1=1, "Unknown") | stats count by stream_display

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | spath input=_raw path=stream output=stream_type | spath input=_raw path=log output=log_msg | search stream_type=* | eval log_level=case( match(log_msg, "(?i)(ERROR|Exception|FATAL)") OR stream_type="stderr", "ERROR", match(log_msg, "(?i)(WARN|Warning)"), "WARN", match(log_msg, "(?i)INFO"), "INFO", match(log_msg, "(?i)DEBUG"), "DEBUG", 1=1, "OTHER" ) | stats count by log_level | sort -count

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "/var/lib/docker/containers/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | spath input=_raw path=stream output=stream_type | spath input=_raw path=log output=log_msg | search stream_type=* | lookup container_lookup.csv container_short_id OUTPUT container_name | eval container_name=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval container_display=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | where match(log_msg, "(?i)(ERROR|Exception|FATAL)") OR stream_type="stderr" | eval log_msg_short=if(len(log_msg)>150, substr(log_msg,1,147)."...", log_msg) | table _time, container_display, host, stream_type, log_msg_short | rename _time as "Time", container_display as "Container", host as "Host", stream_type as "Stream", log_msg_short as "Error Message" | head 50

index=docker sourcetype="docker:container:json" host=$host_filter$ earliest=$time.earliest$ latest=$time.latest$ | rex field=source "/var/lib/docker/containers/(?<container_short_id>[a-f0-9]{12})" | spath input=_raw path=stream output=stream_type | spath input=_raw path=log output=log_msg | search stream_type=* | lookup container_lookup.csv container_short_id OUTPUT container_name | eval container_name=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval container_display=coalesce(container_name, container_short_id) | eval log_level=case( match(log_msg, "(?i)(ERROR|Exception|FATAL)") OR stream_type="stderr", "ERROR", match(log_msg, "(?i)(WARN|Warning)"), "WARN", match(log_msg, "(?i)INFO"), "INFO", match(log_msg, "(?i)DEBUG"), "DEBUG", 1=1, "OTHER" ) | eval log_msg_display=if(len(log_msg)>200, substr(log_msg,1,197)."...", log_msg) | table _time, log_level, container_display, host, log_msg_display | rename _time as "Time", log_level as "Level", container_display as "Container", host as "Host", log_msg_display as "Log Message" | head 100
